response.explain: The previous action code has successfully placed the cooked prawn on the plate. The next step is to place the butter on the plate. The butter is already in the robot's inventory, so it can be directly placed on the plate.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take out the butter from the fridge
(4) Cook the prawn
(5) Move to the plate
(6) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(7) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Place the butter on the plate
    butter = registry(env,"butter_208")
    plate = registry(env,"plate_215")
    put_ontop(robot, butter, plate)
    donothing(env)
